channel.title: Zepsity client fail
channel.description: hey guys , i cant get the zepsity client to run, i couldnt get source, then i fixed it, but now its the client that i am having trouble with and i cant do anything about, i FAIL WITH CLIENTS can anyone help me through here or tv? in my run.bat i have [code=java]@echo off java -cp bin -Xms812m -Xmx1024m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]

item.title: Zepsity client fail
item.dc:creator: @clawzkillall clawzkillall
item.description:
@clawzkillall wrote:

Im having the same problem with the same client… mine just says “press any key to continue”
